SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!setting filter as querry parameter :SET &FILTER_QRY_PARA#="" :if &UC4RB_UIP_FILTER# <> "" : SET &FILTER_QRY_PARA#="$filter" :ENDIF
!setting orderby as querry parameter :SET &ORDERBY_QRY_PARA#="" :if &UC4RB_UIP_ORD_BY# <> "" : SET &ORDERBY_QRY_PARA#="$orderby" :ENDIF
!setting top as querry parameter :SET &TOP_QRY_PARA#="" :if &UC4RB_UIP_TOP# <> "" : SET &TOP_QRY_PARA#="$top" :ENDIF
!setting skip as querry parameter :SET &SKIP_QRY_PARA#="" :if &UC4RB_UIP_SKIP# <> "" : SET &SKIP_QRY_PARA#="$skip" :endif
!setting count as querry parameter :SET &COUNT_QRY_PARA#="$count" :if &UC4RB_UIP_INC_CNT# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_UIP_INC_CNT#="true" :else : SET &UC4RB_UIP_INC_CNT#="false" :endif
!setting expand as querry parameter :SET &EXPAND_QRY_PARA#="" :if &UC4RB_UIP_EXPAND# <> "" : SET &EXPAND_QRY_PARA#="$expand" :ENDIF
